strings.string: \rA robot rises from the floor in front of you. It starts to wrestle with you.\r
\rYour superior brawling skills defeated the robot.\r
The robot pushes you back and attacks.\r
\rThis is a black three foot high cylinder. There is a small slot in the side.\r
\rYou are not a repairable robot. GET OFF.\r
\rThe conveyor belt is not working.\r
\rThis is a yellow cylinder with a slot in the top.\r
\rESCAPE POD ACTIVATED. NEXT POD BEING PREPARED.\r
\rThis is a purple white cylinder glowing faintly. There is a black slot on the side facing you.\r
\rThis cylinder glows with a blue white light. In that glow you can see a small slot on the wall. \r
\rALERT! Self destruction sequence activated. All personnel evacuate the base. This is not a test.\r
A small control panel with four lights blinking out of sequence is before you.\r\r\x11\x10Red.\r\x10Yellow.\r\x10Green.\r\x10Blue.\r
G
R
\rThe way is blocked by a heavy titanium-steel door. There is a card slot in the center.\r
\rAll your dents are being pounded out of you.\r
\x07The screen shows a clock counting down. It shows
\rBefore you is the main power panel of the reactor core. It appears to have a missing part and is not functional.\r
\rNothing seems to happen on the panel but in the distance you hear a low rumbling.\r
\rYou got lucky and were able to slip off.\r
\rThese walls are made of a shiny indestructible alloy.\r
\r"All stations powered," announces a loud computer voice.\r
\rSELF DESTRUCT IRREVERSIBLE! STATION NOW DETONATING! You hear several explosions in the background.\r
\rA force-field blocks you.\r
\rThis door is harder to open than it appears.\r
\rOn the wall in front of you are two arrows with messages. You can't read them from here.\r
\rAn arrow shaped plaque on the wall points to the right. The message on it reads -REACTOR CORE ROOM-.\r
\rThe arrow on the wall indicates that the OSHA room is on the left.\r
\rCarved in the wall the arrow's message indicates that the Robot Maintenence Room is on the left.\r
\rA neon sign on the wall points to the right. It forms the words Security Electronics.\r
\rAn arrow points to the left with the message THIS WAY.\r
\rAn arrow points to the right with the message THAT WAY.\r
\rA sign points to the right. THIS WAY OUT.\r
\rThe sign points left. The message says OTHER WAY OUT.\r
\rIn front of you is a floor to ceiling glass-steel wall. Beyond are the reactor controls.\r
\rThe wall has shattered into a thousand pieces! You were lucky and didn't get cut.\r
\rThis section is not working.\r
Intruder alert! Intruder alert!\r
A security robot attacks you from a hidden door.\r
This security robot doesn't like your snooping.\r
Security robots are climbing out of the walls.\r
The Giant Robot is so tall it touches the ceiling. You'll have to get rid of it if you want to get past.\r
\rThe bolt tightening equipment has grabbed you.\r
\rThe floor in front of you slowly opens and a Giant Robot rises up to block your path.\r
\rYou grabbed an overhead bar and swung off the belt.\r
\rYou are surrounded by the heat and flames of the welding machines.\r
\rOh No! you've been caught by the machine and pulled on to the belt.\r
\rOops! The repair machines thought you were a robot and have put you on the belt.\r
\rThe belt machinery is very delicate here.\r
\rThe conveyor belt sounds like it is destroying itself as it grinds to a halt.\r
\rAs you tried to jam the belt you got caught by the machine and pulled on to the belt.\r
\rThere are eleven light plates on the panel and several are lit.\r
\rOne of the light panels turned off.\r
\rAnother light panel has turned on.\r
\rA message on a screen reads Security Check Interval.\r
\rThe screen reads Interval Reduced.\r
\rThe screen reads Interval Increased.\r
\rYou see a gray oval with five light panels on it.\r
\rThe lights are now off.\r
\rThe lights are on.\r
\rThe fine print reads Cylinder Closing System.\r
\rYou see a square with all four corners lit up.\r
\rAll four corners are lit up.\r
\rAll four corners are now dark.\r
\rLittle pieces of door are all over the place.\r
\rThis door has been knocked over against the wall.\r
\rPieces of glass crunch underfoot.\r
\rOn the floor is an open container of U235.\r
\rThe floor is covered with Plutonium dust.\r
\rA pile of Wastelandium glows brightly here.\r
\rRead paragraph 47.\r
\rRead paragraph 79.\r
\rRead paragraph 130.\r
\rRead paragraph 118.\r
\rNo one but a SUPER genius would be able to understand the workings of this machine.\r
\rThis is a tall rectangle of metal and light fixtures.\r
\rMany lights and wires make up this electronic system.\r
\rYou hear several explosions in the background.\r
\rYou feel the earth shake from the explosions.\r
\rThis control panel is shorted out and smoking.\r
\rStation
activated.
\rWaiting for final station lock.\r
\r
Press button to activate safety procedure #1342-666.\r
\r"Safety procedure #1342-666 activated." You hear a hissing sound followed by a loud slam. You turn around and notice that the panel behind you has been sealed shut.\r
B
Y
\r"Incorrect activation sequence. Procedure aborted." You hear a hissing sound as the panel behind you opens.\r
\rPhase
Continue procedure.\r
